title: Enhancing University Students' Communication Competencies through Constructivist-Based Intergenerational Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Fundamental Scientific Theories and Research Methodologies, along with Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Science learners comprising a mixed cohort of young adults (20s) and middle-aged adults, in a remote/asynchronous collaborative environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will improve intergenerational communication efficiency by at least 80% using project-specific peer assessment tools.
Learners will apply a constructivist-based collaborative learning design framework to conduct at least three intergenerational knowledge integration activities.
Learners will develop and demonstrate five or more intercultural communication scenarios using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Slack).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
